Posts.Content: I've noticed she really likes very expensive purses, jewelry, clothes and vehicles so it might have been as simple as the easy money she thought she could make. Still, highly inappropriate and insensitive, hopefully not reflective of all mortuaries which could try to take advantage when one is most vulnerable. It is a very lucrative business and sometimes money takes precedence over all else. I'm still trying to rationalize it. My oncology team was so shocked by my experience they didn't even know what to say. Well, who would?!
Posts.Title: Shocking Things People Say To Breast Cancer Patients and How I Coped

Posts.Content: New neighbor I'd never even met works for a large local mortuary conglomerate. She's a family counselor with focus on pre-planning. She sent me information and her business card to plan my own funeral. That was 4 years ago and needless to say I have made no effort to meet her! I will survive!
